column1: Kata Robata////Went  with clients and another time with a friend. Happy hour was really packed. The assortment on their happy hour is fantastic. The warm sake was good. Sushi was delicious. Wait staff made some recommendations which was perfect. We asked  our wait staff to surprise us and we were not let down. Great environment. Get there early parking lot is large the gets packed quickly. Great place for a date or for business.
